result.title: Billionaire fund manager Ron Baron praises beaten-up financial stock whose new CEO he compares to Jamie Dimon
result.text: Baron Capital founder and CEO Ron Baron highlighted MSCI and FactSet as two overlooked financial stocks in an appearance on CNBC's "ETF Edge" during which he also talked about the firm's launch of its first ETFs. While Baron's relationship with Elon Musk and his investments in Tesla, SpaceX, and xAI get a lot of attention, Baron says the CEOs of these two companies are a major reason for his bullish outlook.

result.title: MSCI Launches Breakthrough Index Integrating Public Markets and Private Equity
result.text: NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--MSCI Inc. (NYSE: MSCI) launched the MSCI All Country Public + Private Equity Index, an innovative daily index that combines public markets and a broad private equity view within a single, coherent framework. The launch marks a major shift in how investors can assess total equity exposures and measure performance across their portfolio. result.title: Love ETFs? Thank You For Your Cash: MSCI
result.text: MSCI stands out as a premier fund operator benefiting from the explosive growth in ETFs and passive investing trends. MSCI's recurring revenue, robust margins, and double-digit EPS growth support its fair value estimate of $641, offering a 9% upside from current levels. Risks include client concentration, notably with BlackRock, and potential pressure on asset-based fees. But MSCI's financial stability and dividend growth mitigate concerns.

result.title: MSCI: Financial Services 'Winter' Won't Last For Long
result.text: MSCI (MSCI) stands out in the underperforming financial information services sector, trading 20% below historical valuation despite strong growth prospects. The sector faces headwinds from high starting valuations and fears of AI-driven disruption, but MSCI's fundamentals remain resilient. MSCI's Q3 results showed 9.5% revenue growth, high renewal rates near 95%, and record share buybacks, signaling robust business health.
